**ATD0008****藝術英文專題（一）****Selected English Topics in Arts (I)**

**107-1****學期** **Fall 2018**

**美術系****(****博****)  Dept. of Fine Arts (PhD program)**

Time: **每週四** **9-10****節****4.30pm-6.20pm** 

Classroom: **美****101**

Instructor**：** **蘇榕** **副教授**

Email: jungsu@ntnu.edu.tw; [susan.jsu@gmail.com](mailto:susan.jsu@gmail.com)

Office: 誠711

Office hours: Wed 12.20am-14.10pm;

          Thurs 14.20pm-16.20pm, or by appointment

 **Course Description and Objective:**

This course aims at enhancing students’ English proficiency particularly in reading English reference material related to arts and in using English to express or describe the conception of their work of art with a view to preparing them for easier access to the international environment. In the spirit of MOOCS, we require students to read some assigned readings, watch some assigned free online videos, and discuss what they have learned or raise questions in class. Except lecturing and in-class discussions, this course also includes a few fieldtrips, a mid-term oral presentation, a final oral presentation and several written reports after the fieldtrips.

**Requirements**:

\*同學須閱讀指定讀本，以及課堂推薦或指定的相關文字或影音資料，例如參考資料上所列舉的各種網路英文資源，在課堂上用5-10分鐘簡短報告心得。

\*本課程要求同學積極參與課堂討論、報告、參訪、期末藝展等活動，故以上活動均等同出席，將列入評分重要參考。

\*本課程必須於期中發表 10分鐘的PPT[口頭報告](https://moodle2.ntnu.edu.tw/mod/forum/view.php?id=106748)，並繳交500字的英文書面報告，於期末發表 15-20分鐘的PPT[口頭報告](https://moodle2.ntnu.edu.tw/mod/forum/view.php?id=106748)，並繳交1000字的英文書面報告。並於期末舉行期末藝展，用英文以文字簡單描述作品的創作理念。

**Grading Policy**:

\*20%: Class Participation  (e.g. discussion, attendance, presentation, etc.)

\*30%: Midterm: A 10-minute oral presentation and a 500-word mid-term paper (繳交500字書面報告以及10分鐘PPT報告)

\*50%: Final: A 15-20-minute oral presentation and a 1000-word final paper (繳交1000字書面報告以及15-20分鐘PPT報告)
